sentences.en: A long stub causes a significant impedance mismatch and thus reflections.
sentences.cn: 长引出线会引起不可忽视的阻抗失配和反射.
乔戈斯把铅笔头换了个位置.

sentences.en: He lowered his voice and leaned closer, with his cigarette - stub stuck to his lower lip.
sentences.cn: 他压低声音凑过来, 香烟屁股沾在下嘴唇上.

sentences.en: He paused to stub out the butt of his cigar.
sentences.cn: 他停下来，踩灭了手中的烟头。

sentences.en: He pulled the stub of a pencil from behind his ear.
sentences.cn: 他从耳后拿出一小段铅笔头。

sentences.en: I can't write with this pencil stub.
sentences.cn: 我无法用这根铅笔头写字.

sentences.en: She would sit there drawing with the pencil stub.
sentences.cn: 她会坐在那儿用铅笔头画画。

sentences.en: Signs across the entrances warn all visitors to stub out their cigarettes.
sentences.cn: 入口处的告示牌提醒游客们熄灭香烟。

sentences.en: Stub acme thread on stem provides rapid open - close operation.
sentences.cn: 阀杆上的短梯形螺纹适用于快速启闭操作.

sentences.en: The crayon had been worn down to a stub.
sentences.cn: 这枝蜡笔用得只剩一小段了.

sentences.en: The dog only has a stub of a tail , ie a very short one.
The left - handed client often smudged the ink on the stub when he wrote his check.
sentences.cn: 左撇子 顾客在书写支票时往往会弄脏存根上的墨水字迹.

sentences.en: The third cut is made close to the supporting limb to remove the stub.
sentences.cn: 第三锯贴近大枝,去掉短桩.

sentences.en: Yes. When you get on the transfer bus, just show the bus driver this ticket stub.
sentences.cn: 要.当你上了转乘的公共汽车时, 就把这张票根给司机看.

sentences.en: You prepared to let me stub it out on your eyeball?
sentences.cn: 你同意我在你的眼球上熄掉它 吗 ?

words.tran_cn: 短而硬的；断株样的；短而粗的
短而粗硬的；又短又秃的；断株样的

phrases.tran_cn: 工资单；工资存根；工资单据

trans.tran_cn: 树桩，铅笔头，烟蒂，票根，存根
trans.tran_en: the part of a ticket that is given back to you after it has been torn, as proof that you have paid

trans.tran_cn: 使（脚趾）碰到某物，捻灭（香烟，雪茄等），连根拔出
